name: I-MAN (Atthania)
description:
GGJ Url: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/i-man

SYNOPSIS

Help I-Man to process the pieces of his factory !

CONTROLS

WASD / Arrows -> Move

Left mouse -> Attract

Right mouse -> Repel
